name: Homepage - Apply Online - Verify the redirection from DAC when RI is cancelled

testSteps.description: Homepage - Apply Online - Verify the redirection from DAC when RI is cancelled #1: {mainLinksItem=apply online}

children.description: Given I am on the Disaster Assistance homepage
When I click on {apply online} within the main links bar
Then I click on cancel and I should be redirected to the correct environment

userStory.narrative:
In order to assure that the basic functionality of disasterassistance.gov is working
As a tester
I want to run the daily regressions at least twice a day
